txt.en:
'You have the look of an experienced Warden, [placeholder]. As you well know, ours is the job of protecting homelands, no matter how odd \qhome\q might seem.

'In this case, the dwarves seek to reclaim their ancient home of Moria, likely the largest city ever known to the peoples of Middle-earth.

'If you would lend your aid, the dwarves of the Iron Garrison would be most grateful, as would I. There are many Nameless that infest the south-east reaches of the Foundations of Stone. Hunt them down, then return to me when you are finished.'
'Well done, [placeholder].  Let us speak of your next task.'
Nameless hordes plague the deep places of Moria.
Defeated Nameless in the Foundations of Stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Nameless in the Foundations of Stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Nameless can be found in the south-west reaches of the Foundations of Stone.\n\nSadreda has asked you to prove your worth by defeating the Nameless.
Talk to Sadreda at the Shadowed Refuge
Sadreda is at the Shadowed Refuge in the Foundations of Stone, north-west from the lairs of the Nameless there.\n\nYou should return to Sadreda with news of your victory.
